Greedent (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0819: Skwovet
Pokémon
#0821: Rookidee →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Greedent (TCG Pocket).

Greedent has been featured on 11 different cards since it debuted in the Rebel Clash expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Greedent cards are normally Colorless-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Greedent

Greedent
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
